A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: NO SPOILERS: The Last Jedi does not follow the usual Star Wars plot of \"blow up the big thing.\" There are plenty of unexpected twists and turns that make this story really unique. I was shoveling popcorn in my face at full speed because I was so focused on what was going to happen next. It all leads up to an epic showdown that will leave you talking about it for days.
